data.text:
It's been a bit since I came knocking on the gates of Tracen 
Academy. Today, finally, my new lifestyle begins……!
data.processed:
󠁿It's been a bit since I came knocking on the gates of Tracen 
󠁿Academy. Today, finally, my new lifestyle begins……!

data.text:
Nice to meet you, Trainer <username>. 
I'm the Chief Trainer of the team that you've joined.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Nice to meet you, Trainer <username>. 
󠁿I'm the Chief Trainer of the team that you've joined.

data.text:
As you can see, I've gotten quite old. The time I'll have to 
spend teaching you might be short but…… sub-trainer, I look 
forward to working with you.
data.name: Chief Trainer

choices.text: Yes! I look forward to working with you!
choices.processed: <size=41>Yes! I look forward to working with you!</size>

data.processed:
󠁿As you can see, I've gotten quite old. The time I'll have to 
󠁿spend teaching you might be short but…… sub-trainer, I look 
󠁿forward to working with you.

data.text:
Fufufu, good answer. I have high hopes for you, so 
work hard, okay? After all, I did spend quite a bit 
of time observing you before I chose you.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Fufufu, good answer. I have high hopes for you, so 
󠁿work hard, okay? After all, I did spend quite a bit 
󠁿of time observing you before I chose you.

data.text:
Alright, let's get to it―― 
shall we go meet those all-important Uma Musume?
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Alright, let's get to it―― 
󠁿shall we go meet those all-important Uma Musume?

data.text:
Newcomers to the academy will often become a sub-trainer 
underneath a veteran, helping their team, until they've gained 
enough experience to lead their own.
data.processed:
󠁿Newcomers to the academy will often become a sub-trainer 
󠁿underneath a veteran, helping their team, until they've gained 
󠁿enough experience to lead their own.

data.text:
This time, I was the sub to a true veteran, Chief Trainer. 
The Uma Musume we're responsible for is――
data.processed:
󠁿This time, I was the sub to a true veteran, Chief Trainer. 
󠁿The Uma Musume we're responsible for is――

data.text:
Haa, haa…… I've finished the menu, Trainer. 
I'm ready for the next assignment, please.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Haa, haa…… I've finished the menu, Trainer. 
󠁿I'm ready for the next assignment, please.

data.text:
Good work, Bell-chan. Next up is parallel running but…… do you 
have a moment before we start? ――He's the one we talked about 
before, the sub-trainer.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Good work, Bell-chan. Next up is parallel running but…… do you 
󠁿have a moment before we start? ――He's the one we talked about 
󠁿before, the sub-trainer.

data.text:
Good work, Bell-chan. Next up is parallel running but…… do you 
have a moment before we start? ――She's the one we talked about 
before, the sub-trainer.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Good work, Bell-chan. Next up is parallel running but…… do you 
󠁿have a moment before we start? ――She's the one we talked about 
󠁿before, the sub-trainer.

data.text: ……Hello.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿……Hello.

data.text: Ah…… right. Umm, pleased to meet you.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Ah…… right. Umm, pleased to meet you.

data.text:
Sub-trainer, once again, her name is Bell-chan…… Mejiro Dober. 
An important, precious Uma Musume of my team.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Sub-trainer, once again, her name is Bell-chan…… Mejiro Dober. 
󠁿An important, precious Uma Musume of my team.

data.text:
Sub-trainer, once again, her name is Bell-chan…… Mejiro Dober. 
An important, precious Uma Musume of my team.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Sub-trainer, once again, her name is Bell-chan…… Mejiro Dober. 
󠁿An important, precious Uma Musume of my team.

data.text:
For me, she'll probably be the last Uma Musume that I train. 
As you can see, I've become quite the old lady.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿For me, she'll probably be the last Uma Musume that I train. 
󠁿As you can see, I've become quite the old lady.

data.text: Trainer……
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer……

data.text:
Oh, I'm sorry, it's fine Bell-chan! 
I'm still quite healthy, so don't make such a lonely face.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, I'm sorry, it's fine Bell-chan! 
󠁿I'm still quite healthy, so don't make such a lonely face.

data.text:
――Excuse me. I've come to help with parallel running training, 
are we ready to start?
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
󠁿――Excuse me. I've come to help with parallel running training, 
󠁿are we ready to start?

data.text:
Yes, of course! Thanks for coming, Air Groove-san. 
Bell-chan, are you ready?
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Yes, of course! Thanks for coming, Air Groove-san. 
󠁿Bell-chan, are you ready?

data.text:
Yes……! Senpai, I look forward 
to running with you!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Yes……! Senpai, I look forward 
󠁿to running with you!

data.text:
And so, parallel training for Mejiro Dober 
and Air Groove began.
data.processed:
󠁿And so, parallel training for Mejiro Dober 
󠁿and Air Groove began.

data.text:
Her training partner had earned the nickname "Empress". Someone 
who, like her mother, had the strength to win the G1 『Oaks』.
data.processed:
󠁿Her training partner had earned the nickname "Empress". Someone 
󠁿who, like her mother, had the strength to win the G1 『Oaks』.

data.text:
Mejiro Dober on the other hand, was someone who hadn't debuted 
yet. But it seemed like she was able to keep up――!
data.processed:
󠁿Mejiro Dober on the other hand, was someone who hadn't debuted 
󠁿yet. But it seemed like she was able to keep up――!

data.text: Haa, haa, haa…… Haaaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haa, haa…… Haaaaaaaaaa!!

data.text: ……! Fu, not bad……!!
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: 󠁿……! Fu, not bad……!!

data.text:
Using her whole body, built up from physical training, she was 
able to show such wonderful speed. I could feel the innate 
talent. However, that's not all――
data.processed:
󠁿Using her whole body, built up from physical training, she was 
󠁿able to show such wonderful speed. I could feel the innate 
󠁿talent. However, that's not all――

data.text:
Not yet, not yeeeeet!! 
――Aaaaaaaaaaah!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Not yet, not yeeeeet!! 
󠁿――Aaaaaaaaaaah!!

data.text:
To the end, never giving up, pushing further and 
further forward with the determination to win. That 
strong will left a striking impression……!
data.processed:
󠁿To the end, never giving up, pushing further and 
󠁿further forward with the determination to win. That 
󠁿strong will left a striking impression……!

data.text: Haaa, Haaa, Haaa…… thank you…… very much……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Haaa, Haaa, Haaa…… thank you…… very much……!

data.text:
No problem. Looks like…… you've gotten stronger, Dober. 
That was some magnificent speed.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
󠁿No problem. Looks like…… you've gotten stronger, Dober. 
󠁿That was some magnificent speed.

data.text:
No, that's not true…… my position taking and drive 
timing, are still lacking. In the end, I wasn't 
able to pull ahead of senpai even once…
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿No, that's not true…… my position taking and drive 
󠁿timing, are still lacking. In the end, I wasn't 
󠁿able to pull ahead of senpai even once…

data.text:
Haha, I won't let you pull ahead that easily. But, I could 
definitely feel you pulling up behind me…… You've got yourself 
a good trainer, don't you?
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
󠁿Haha, I won't let you pull ahead that easily. But, I could 
󠁿definitely feel you pulling up behind me…… You've got yourself 
󠁿a good trainer, don't you?

data.text: Yes……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Yes……!

data.text:
I'm still far, far too weak… but if it looks like I've gotten 
even a little bit stronger, that's all because of Trainer.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿I'm still far, far too weak… but if it looks like I've gotten 
󠁿even a little bit stronger, that's all because of Trainer.

data.text: Yes, yes! Bell-can, that was a really good run, wasn't it?
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed: 󠁿Yes, yes! Bell-can, that was a really good run, wasn't it?

data.text:
Oh my! Fufu, your eyes are sparkling. ……That's right, I knew 
you were the kind of trainer that would look that way.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Oh my! Fufu, your eyes are sparkling. ……That's right, I knew 
󠁿you were the kind of trainer that would look that way.

data.text:
……She's amazing isn't she? Bell-chan. 
Her mind and body, both are overflowing with possibilities.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿……She's amazing isn't she? Bell-chan. 
󠁿Her mind and body, both are overflowing with possibilities.

data.text:
That girl's wonderful future, I want 
to keep watching over her but――
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿That girl's wonderful future, I want 
󠁿to keep watching over her but――

data.text:
Um, Trainer! I'm not tired yet so, before cooldown, 
can I run a bit more with senpai outside the school?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Um, Trainer! I'm not tired yet so, before cooldown, 
󠁿can I run a bit more with senpai outside the school?

data.text:
Well well, Bell-chan, lately you've been really 
fired up! Let's see, if it's just one lap that 
should be fine. Go at a light pace, okay?
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Well well, Bell-chan, lately you've been really 
󠁿fired up! Let's see, if it's just one lap that 
󠁿should be fine. Go at a light pace, okay?

data.text: Okay, thank you very much. I'll be off!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Okay, thank you very much. I'll be off!

data.text: ……alright, shall we get to the clean up work then?
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed: 󠁿……alright, shall we get to the clean up work then?

data.text:
That day, I couldn't stop thinking about Mejiro Dober's 
amazing running while I was helping Chief Trainer……
data.processed:
󠁿That day, I couldn't stop thinking about Mejiro Dober's 
󠁿amazing running while I was helping Chief Trainer……

data.text: Hm…… wait, Dober.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: 󠁿Hm…… wait, Dober.

data.text:
Huh……? 
Oh――
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Huh……? 
󠁿Oh――

data.text:
Ryan-san! Ryan-san! 
Mejiro Ryan-san, please look this way!
data.name: Reporters
data.processed:
󠁿Ryan-san! Ryan-san! 
󠁿Mejiro Ryan-san, please look this way!

data.text:
The other day, you had a particularly splendid performance, 
Mejiro Ryan-san! A large number of fans have high expectations 
for next time, what are your thoughts?
data.name: Otonashi Etsuko
data.processed:
󠁿The other day, you had a particularly splendid performance, 
󠁿Mejiro Ryan-san! A large number of fans have high expectations 
󠁿for next time, what are your thoughts?

data.text:
Um……! I'm really happy they're rooting for me! In order to 
meet their expectations, I'll be training vigorously again!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
󠁿Um……! I'm really happy they're rooting for me! In order to 
󠁿meet their expectations, I'll be training vigorously again!

data.text: ――Let's circle around back. Come on, Dober.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: 󠁿――Let's circle around back. Come on, Dober.

data.text: Okay…… senpai.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Okay…… senpai.
